```{r, eval=TRUE, echo = FALSE, comment= ""}
date()

library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(
  lat = c(4.6097102,3.4372201,6.2518401,10.9685402,10.3997202,
7.8939099,4.6097102, 3.4372201, 6.2518401, 10.9685402, 10.3997202, 7.8939099, 7.1253901, 4.8133302, 11.2407904, 4.43889, 6.3373199, 1.2136101, 5.0688901, 2.9273, 10.9184303, 4.1420002, 4.5338898, 4.57937, 10.4631395, 6.1846099, 8.7479801),
  lng = c( -74.081749, -76.5224991, -75.563591, -74.7813187, -75.5144424,-72.5078201, -74.081749, -76.5224991, -75.563591,-74.7813187,  -75.5144424,-72.5078201, -73.1197968, -75.6961136,-74.1990433,-75.2322235,  -75.5579529, -77.2811127, -75.5173798,-75.2818909,-74.7645874,  -73.6266403,  -75.6811066,  -74.2168198,  -73.2532196,-75.5991287,-75.8814316)
)

df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
